title: Looking for Bronze team mates for a fun team. You have to be bad to join.
body:
Looking for bronze players to do sh*t plays with. message me for invite. 

*ONLY REQUIREMENT TO JOIN IS TO BE BRONZE*

XFULL TEAMX

replies.body: I'm Wood VI, does that count?
My name is "misfire" in league  are you in NA?

> [{quoted}](name=Misfire,realm=NA,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=iyrE4OW6,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-07-05T16:04:08.010+0000)
>
> My name is "misfire" in league  are you in NA?

Most of the players on here are playing on the Oceania region; for NA Team Recruitment, use the link below! 

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment
Remember to add me to your opponent when ranked! Let's the bad vs the worse!
Added you :3 if not add me, hope you have room for an adc main :D
Im in Bronze V and have a <20% win ratio (partly due to the fact that i do not play ranked much, but have been trying to improoooove). Am I elegible?? ADD MEH
im happy to join, i dont think i am that bad, but i am bronze, so i guess im just biased then
i have to warn you, i've been compared to faker. jks im sh*t sure you can join.
I am Unranked but I bet a could be a worthy team mate. Play any role.
